text:
I donâ€™t have a specific sublime one, though a syntax highlighter for jinja should do the trick. A lot of developers have been using VS Code with HubSpot. For VS Code:

I would recommend the jinja scopes extension <https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=wholroyd.jinja>

Which will provide syntax highlighting

There is also a plugin for HubL <https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=WilliamSpiro.hubl>

Which provides auto-complete snippets and other handy shortcuts.
<@UG52C29EE> I used jQuery length and size function to count
